data.title: Marcius Galan
data.meta_description: (this page was last updated in February 2024)Indianapolis, USA, 1972. Lives and works in São Paulo, Brazil Represented by Galeria Luisa Strina and Galeria Silvia Cintra + Box 4. PIPA 2010 Finalist. PIPA 2012 Winner. Member of PIPA 2013 Nominating Committee. Marcius Galan was born in Indianapolis, USA, son of Brazilian parents who returned to Brazil before...
